### Description

In week 2, we will take a look at some ways of creatings various types of graphs and plots with R. In particular, we will cover the following topics:

- barplots
- histograms
- specifying colors
- boxplots
- kernel density estimation
- scatterplots
- binning / jittering / alpha blending
- installing R packages
- saving figures
- 2d kernel density estimation
- contour plots
- 3d perspective plots
- subplots
- building plots

The R script for this tutorial:

- [intro_to_r_week_2.r](https://www.dropbox.com/s/as2ik4wc3ab4wlf/intro_to_r_week_2.r?dl=1)

The dataset for this tutorial:

- [data_survey_edit.rdata](https://www.dropbox.com/s/as2ik4wc3ab4wlf/intro_to_r_week_2.r?dl=1)
